title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with one command. Ships a Go CLI, REST API and Docker image.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama). Works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (PyPI: ollama). Sync & async APIs, streaming, chat, embeddings, pulls.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (pip: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models for chat, embeddings and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG, multi-user, dark/light themes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library (Maven Central) for Ollama with sync/async APIs, streaming, chat, embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps ollama with prompts, shell shortcuts and conversation history.

title: llama-cpp-ollama
summary: Reddit discussion on how Ollama uses llama.cpp under the hood and benchmarks vs raw llama.cpp.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (pip: ollama-haystack) for retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose templates for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments plus OpenAI-compatible sidecar.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit app showing RAG with Ollama, ChromaDB and Sentence-Transformers for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Merged Nix flake that adds Ollama to nixpkgs; install via "nix run nixpkgs#ollama".

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client (NuGet: Ollama) with async streaming and chat APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate (crates.io: ollama-rs) providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama.

title: ollama-php
summary: Community PHP client (Packagist: ollama/ollama) with Laravel wrapper for chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into channels with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local AI autocomplete using Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed and CloudWatch logging.
